Text: RE Bob Picks IndyPool Update Heres where things stand The pool will continue Im still waiting to here back from Dave Heinemen Nathan Dougherty and Mark Hull to find out what they want to do For those that responded so promptlyThank you Ill be in Houston tomorrow and out of the office Thursday Please send me your pick by am Friday Alex Woodruff and Jerry Padilla have elected to collect their money now Youll receive your money when Bob resumes his Pool Director chair next week Enjoy your day Larry Bevans This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

RE Bob Picks IndyOkheres the deal EVERYONE lost this week which means we all split st nd and rd place money divided by We have a couple of options Receive now Maybe Bob W will throw in the extra cents for everyone so we can round our winnings up to Game over Let everything ride No coming back to collect later though This also means that the pot of dollars will be smaller by the number of players electing to take their winnings now Please let me know your intentions by noon tomorrow Roll the dice and continue to play or collect your money now Thanks Larry Bevans Original Message From Williams Bob Sent Friday October AM To Bevans Larry Dave Heinemen Dougherty Nathan Jernigan Steven Jerry Padilla Joey Brewer LoreLei Reid Paul Lucci Pike Steven Turner Robert Williams Bob Woodruff Alexander Subject Bob Picks Indy This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

RE Losers PoolThe jury is still out LoreLei Reids pick isnt on the spreadsheet that Bob sent to me Everyone else is out LoreLei may have left a voice message with Bob or sent him an email on Friday I havent spoken to Bob yet today If shes not outshe wins If she didnt survivea decision needs to be made on what to do about the pool Options Divide among people Game over Let anyone who wants to collect their do sothen continue on with the game with the ones who want to stay Do you have LoreLeis phone number Original Message From Lucci Paul T mailtoPaulT NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Williams Bob Bevans Larry Subject Losers Pool What did this week look like Im out but I bet a lot of people are too Shoot me the updated list please And whats up for the weekend Im starting early This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

RE testIm going to Bobs Halloween party on the th I assume you are too My divorce is final next Thursday Ill plan to meet you later that day Im taking Thursday and Friday off Original Message From Thursday so you better be there What are you doing on the th Original Message From Bevans Larry mailtoLarry lPasocom Sent Friday October AM To Lucci Paul T Subject RE test Your test was successful FW singleSubject single A woman was shopping at her local supermarket where she selected a quart of milk a carton of eggs juice and a package of bacon As she was unloading her items on the conveyer belt to check out a drunk standing behind her watched as she placed her items in front of the cashier He said You must be single The woman a bit startled looked at her four items on the belt and seeing nothing particularly unusual about her selections said Well yknow thats right But how in earth did you know that The drunk said Cause youre uglier n shit This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
